content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab
Consists of lab (position not specified) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 57}

### Chests
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5) 

### Inserter system
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) 

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the research is valid and available before setting it.

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Make sure the entities are close enough to be connected.
-  Ensure the connection points are available and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is empty and available for placement before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when refueling entities
-  Make sure the entity is out of fuel before attempting to refuel it.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel and is placed correctly before starting the mining process.

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace has enough fuel and ingredients before starting the smelting process.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure the offshore pump is placed correctly and has enough fuel before starting the pumping process.

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and has enough fuel before starting the generation process.

### Errors when using pipes
-  Ensure the pipes are connected correctly and not blocked by other entities before using them to transport fluids.

### Errors when using inserter systems
-  Ensure the inserter system is set up correctly and has enough fuel before starting the insertion process.

### Errors when managing inventory
-  Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to add more items.
-  Ensure the inventory has enough items before attempting to remove them.
